1:
I was glad when people said to me,\q2 "We should go to the temple of Yahweh in Jerusalem!"
\q1
2:
Now we are here,\q2 standing inside the gates of Jerusalem.
\q1
3:
We can see that Jerusalem was a carefully built city.\q2 Every part of the city was built to fit together
\q2 within the city as a whole. 

\q1
4:
We people of the tribes of Israel\q2 who belong to Yahweh can now go up there,
\q2 as Yahweh commanded that we should do,
\q2 so we can thank him.
\q1
5:
There are the thrones,\q2 the thrones that the kings of Israel sat
\q2 when they ruled Israel. 
\q2 These are the thrones of the descendants of King David.



\q1
6:
Pray that there will be peace in Jerusalem!\q1 "I pray that those who love Jerusalem will succeed in life.
\q1
7:
I pray that there may be peace inside the walls of the city\q2 and that people who are inside the palaces may be safe."


\q1
8:
For the sake of my relatives and friends,\q2 "I pray that people will live peacefully inside Jerusalem."
\q1
9: And because I love the temple of Yahweh our God,\q2 "I pray that things will go well for the people who live in Jerusalem."
